about_the_game:
Try a couple of short segments within the mysterious realm of the Maze Meister!

You have landed in the Sunset Realm, what is this place and where is Penny?

Use the mouse to look around and arrow keys / WASD to walk.

Hold left mouse button or left or right shift key to jog / run!

Thank you for trying the Mr. Maze demo... Get the full game today!
detailed_description:
Try a couple of short segments within the mysterious realm of the Maze Meister!

You have landed in the Sunset Realm, what is this place and where is Penny?

Use the mouse to look around and arrow keys / WASD to walk.

Hold left mouse button or left or right shift key to jog / run!

Thank you for trying the Mr. Maze demo... Get the full game today!

name: Mr. Maze Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit OS)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 1GB of RAM (Nvidia GeForce GTX 260 or higher/ATI Radeon 4890 or higher)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard. Specification is for low resolution/quality settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit OS)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 2GB of RAM (NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard. Specification is for high resolution/quality settings

short_description: Try a couple of short segments within the mysterious realm of the Maze Meister!
